short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalistic extensible in-browser framework for the Galaxy chat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: m0ssion is a free, open-source extension that provides API for Galaxy chat. The aim of m0ssion is to provide an easy and powerful tool for those who wants to improve their experience with Galaxy chat or are annoyed by some «features» like permanent money sucking, silly games, annoying appearing objects or disturbing notifications. Nevertheless, this framework can do almost everything with the chat. It depends only on your fantasy and programming skills.
